title: MF should not even be able to be a viable supp
body: riot you messed up somewhere people are abusing the supp role now . You should make it mandatory that only certain champions are able to play supp in a game

MF is not really a viable support. It was picked by an LCS team against another LCS team to counter a specific champion that LCS team was using. 

LCS is not like regular league games. Most things that work there don't really work well outside of it, and most things that work outside of it don't work there. Might as well be a different game for how little it has in common with regular League games.
